turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a pizza from Cosaro's Pizza in Kingsburg.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order one medium half pepperoni, half sausage pizza with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. One medium half pepperoni, half sausage pizza with extra cheese. Sending order to Cosaro's Pizza in Kingsburg now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cosaro's Pizza is out of sausage. Would you like to change your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'll get one medium pizza with pepperoni and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. One Medium pizza with pepperoni and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total is $19.95. Did you want to ask for immediate pick up or schedule pick up for a later date and time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Now please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Please hold on. Confirming immediate pick up of one medium pepperoni pizza with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been sent.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cosaro's is experiencing a back log of orders so your order will be briefly delayed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. How long is the wait?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a nice evening.
